title: As our discussion of Greek sexual graffiti indicated, pedico does not always act as a metonymous substitute for “homosexual”. Pedico/pedicator may be used to describe men who today would be labeled “homosexual” (or, more specifically, men who play the insertive role in penetrative acts with other males). But the literal meaning, denoting “a man who anally penetrates”, can encompass female objects
